Sokratus

Make me your mentor

Like everyday, I was reaching towards my ‘inbox zero’ goal and I found this newsletter from 99u.com. It had this story titled ‘This is why you don’t have a mentor’. I could easily relate to that title. So I was going through the article and suddenly it hit me, what if I don’t seek out for mentors? What if I offer mentorship from my side? Sure I’m relatively new in this business but there are bunch of people who are just starting out. I remember my early days when I clearly did not have sense of... almost anything.
